name: Out of Time
lyric:
You don't know what's going on
You've been away for far too long
You can't come back and think you are still mine
You're out of touch, my baby
My poor discarded baby
I said, baby, baby, baby, you're out of time

Well, baby, baby, baby, you're out of time
I said, baby, baby, baby, you're out of time
You are all left out
Out of there without a doubt
Cause baby, baby, baby, you're out of time

You thought you were a clever girl
Giving up your social whirl
But you can't come back and be the first in line, oh no
You're obsolete my baby
My poor old-fashioned baby
I said baby, baby, baby you're out of time

Well, baby, baby, baby, you're out of time
I said, baby, baby, baby, you're out of time
Yes, you are left out
Out of there without a doubt
Cause baby, baby, baby, you're out of time

I said, baby, baby, you're out of time
lyric_extra: 文本歌词最后由 夜潕鬼鬼 编辑于2019-09-11 15:11

一个国内著名独立乐队贡献的翻唱。怎么说呢，总体来说味道有点不足吧。虽然听起来似乎是挺激烈的，但是少了太多的怨气和嘲讽，所以到最后……之于我而言就是有些疲软的感觉了。当然，如果不仔细听的话是不错的翻唱了。

来自android客户端

这是什么鬼翻译……这里的“Out Of Time”意思是“你已经不是我的选择了”，“毫无疑问你已经不是我的选择了”。这首歌唱的是对想吃回头草的前任的嘲讽，和什么时间紧迫没关系。
